snippet: Van Cortlandt Park is commemorating its 100th year as a mecca for high school meets; college meets; N.C.A.A. championships and United States nationals and more.
abstract: Van Cortland Park in the Bronx commemorates its 100th year as a mecca for high school cross-country running meets; 40th annual Manhattan College Invitational will be held on its notoriously challenging course.
lead_paragraph: Van Cortlandt Park is commemorating its 100th year as a mecca for high school meets; college meets; N.C.A.A. championships and United States nationals and more.

headline.seo: For New York Cross-Country Runners, a Century-Old Proving Ground In a Bronx Park, a Century of Testing Runners’ Speed and Spirit
headline.main: A Century of Testing Runners’ Speed and Spirit
headline.print_headline: In the Bronx, a Century of Mud, Sweat and Cheers
